We are London based painters and decorators

What makes our painters and decorators different?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1548506840940{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Speedy Service

[vc_column_text]

We respond to any inquiry within two hours; we are available for consultation as soon as the next day. Get your London property transformed and book your house painters and decorators for the same week!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Easy process

[vc_column_text color=”#404040″]

With our hassle-free painting and decorating service, you can leave everything to us. You’re our priority. All you need to do is to book your consultation. We then inspect, advise, and paint!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Top Quality

[vc_column_text]

We have been painting London properties for years and our experienced painters and decorators use only superior materials. Plus, we give six months warranty on every job.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Experienced Team

[vc_column_text]

Our team has a minimum of 5 years of experience, knowing the best tools and materials depending on the desired service. Our professionalism and quality makes us stand out from the crowd.

    [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1626850799788{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display”]

    Excellent service guaranteed, delivered by our painters and decorators across London

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

    We value the trust that our clients place in us.

    [vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626777279679{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Here is our Customer Pledge:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text color=”#404040″]
    • We will be honest and trustworthy
    • We will give you a realistic timescales, so you know how long your painting and decorating project will take
    • We will provide a final cost before starting painting and decorating
    • We will keep you updated continuously
    • We will respect your property and maintain a clean environment
    • We will arrange a professional cleaning service if needed
    • We will be complying with Health & Safety regulations and The Best Practice.
    [/vc_column_text]
    GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8945″ img_size=”400×600″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1626771119702{margin-top: 40px !important;background-color: #4c2c3d !important;}”][vc_column]

    What our customers say about us and
    painting and decorating jobs we have completed across London

    [vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1552923219689{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_row_inner]

    Great team and excellent job! The Good Painter was recommended by a friend of mine, also a professional landlord. The team didn’t disappoint, great service and excellent quality job! I will use the Good Painter the next time I need painting and decorating in London!

    AlexSee Case Study
    Rating: 5

    My wife and I are more than pleased with the final result, and can’t wait to invite friends and family over to our new looking home. We are quite certain to have dealings with your firm in future projects. I would 100% recommend you to my friends, family and colleagues.

    JonathanSee Case Study
    Rating: 5

    Thank you The Good painter! We are extremely happy with the results! We couldn’t ask for a friendlier, more hardworking and dedicated team of professionals! Would happily recommend The Good Painter to friends and family!

     

    YasminaSee Case Study
    Rating: 5

    Thank you! We love our new flat, it looks absolutely stunning! We are so happy to have chosen The Good Painter, a fantastic team of hard working guys! Very professional, flexible and friendly service throughout. The good Painter are indeed good painters, excellent painters!

    PavelSee case study
    Rating: 5

    Punctual, friendly and very professional! I have used the services of The Good Painter before and would gladly use them again! The job was completed on time and at a very high quality, the price was excellent, the customer service-very competent and friendly. A pleasure to work with!

    AnaSee Case Study
    Rating: 5

    Thank you, The Good Painter! We really appreciate you finishing the job despite the tight time frame and budget!  A team of professionals, decoration at the highest level! We couldn’t be happier with the results.

    MonicaSee Case Study
    Rating: 5

    I recently became a house owner for the first time and needed quality painting and decorating services at a good price. The Good Painter provided both, plus excellent decoration and colour consultancy advice on the top. Stress-free service, very helpful and friendly customer service! I definitely recommend! Thank you!

    ZoeSee Case Study
    Rating: 5
